name: Monkey eats bananas
description:
A little bitsy game that I made for the bitsy ritual jam! It's a Princess Chelsea's Monkey Eats Banans remake. and it's the first bitsy game I made, so it's basically just me trying to learn how to do bitsy. Hope you like it tho! 

Unofficial "soundtrack" and heavily inspired by: Princess Chelsea - Monkey Eats Bananas (IDK how to add music to the game ://).
